welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Fe, where the rich cultural heritage and stunning adobe architecture create a unique and charming atmosphere. Get ready to explore the historic Plaza, renowned art galleries, and delicious Southwestern cuisine during your stay. Enjoy your time in this one-of-a-kind city!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Santa Fe Airport, with check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional flights to nearby cities and towns.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Los Alamos Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Los Alamos Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
